personalQuizQuestions.question: Do you include a variety of vegetables and fruits in your daily diet?
Do you prefer whole-grain bread, pasta, and cereal over refined grain products?
Do you consciously choose foods and drinks that are low in calories and added sugar?
Do you rarely (or never) consume red meat or processed meat like bacon, hot dogs, and sausage?
Do you limit your consumption of high-calorie baked goods such as pies, cakes, cookies, sweet rolls, and doughnuts?
Do you seldom add butter, margarine, oil, sour cream, or mayonnaise to foods when cooking or at the table?
Do you rarely consume fried foods?
Do you refrain from consuming alcohol or only drink it occasionally?
Do you drink an adequate amount of water daily?
Do you make an effort to eat a balanced diet that includes a variety of food groups?
Do you avoid or limit your intake of sugary beverages like soda, sweetened tea, and energy drinks?
Do you prioritize consuming lean protein sources such as poultry, fish, tofu, and legumes?
Do you opt for healthy cooking methods such as grilling, baking, steaming, or broiling rather than frying?
Do you read food labels and pay attention to serving sizes and nutritional content?
Do you eat slowly and mindfully, paying attention to hunger and fullness cues?
Do you avoid eating late at night or close to bedtime?
